Sample.Title: scRNAseq of cells from the preoptic region of a pool of three female mice: Replicate 1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Mice were housed individually for 3 days prior to sampling
Channel.Extract-Protocol: The preoptic region of the hypothalamus was dissected from freshly prepared brains, dissociated into individual cells via protease treatement, FACS sorted to enrich live cells, and then prepared using the 10X Chromium protocols. Libraries were constructed following the instructions of the 10xGenomics Chromium platform

Sample.Description: Processed data are contained with the matrix.mtx file and correspond to all cell names that end with -1
Sample.Data-Processing: Construction of fastq files using cellranger (v2.0.0) mkfastq command Alignment of files to reference genome using cellranger (v2.0.0) count Aggregation of multiple samples using cellranger (v2.0.0) aggr Genome_build: mm10-1.2.0 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: matrix.mtx contains the aggreggated counts from all samples barcodes.tsv contains the name associated with each cell for all samples. The order is the same as the order of entries in matrix.mtx genes.tsv contains the name associated with each measured gene. The order is the same as the order of entries in matrix.mtx

Series.Title: Molecular, Spatial and Functional Single-Cell Profiling of the Hypothalamic Preoptic Region
Series.Summary: Single-cell RNA sequencing of ~31,000 cells dissociated and captured from the preoptic region of the hypothalamus from multiple male and female mice
Series.Overall-Design: Three replicates each of male and female mice
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
